name: .SNT
summary: Learn about .SNT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: In most cases, you will not have to manually open an SNT file. Instead, when you open Sticky Notes, the app will automatically load your Sticky Notes from the SNT file saved in the following directory:
However, if you need to manually open an SNT file, you can:
Right-click on your SNT file and select Open.
From the window that appears, choose Select a program from a list of installed programs.
Navigate to C:/​Windows/​System32 and select StikyNot.exe.
